mapper.select: SELECT t2.relation_file_title relationFileTitle, t1.company_zh_name companyName, t2.iec_result iecResult, t3.label_name iecResultStr, date_format(t2.process_time,'%Y-%m-%d') examineDate, date_format(t2.process_time,'%Y年%m月%d日') examineDateStr FROM ipo_case t1 LEFT JOIN ipo_process t2 ON t1.id = t2.bid LEFT JOIN maa_conf_label t3 on t3.label_code = 'IPO_VERIFY_RESULT' and t3.label_value = t2.iec_result WHERE (t2.process_type_code = '07' or t2.process_type_code = '35') AND t1.id = #{id} AND t2.table_sort = '1' order by t2.process_time

SELECT t2.id question_id, t2.text_content, t4.letter_class_name question_type, CAST(t2.ask_no AS SIGNED) askNo, t8.text_content answer FROM sa_letter t1 LEFT JOIN label_xml_structure t2 ON t2.rela_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN letter_class t4 ON t4.tree_type != '1' AND FIND_IN_SET(t4.id, t2.question_type) LEFT JOIN letter_class t5 ON t5.id = t4.parent_id LEFT JOIN letter_class t6 ON t6.id = t1.letter_type LEFT JOIN label_ask_answer t7 ON t7.ask_id = t6.id LEFT JOIN label_xml_structure t8 ON t8.id = t7.answer_id WHERE t1.rela_code = #{orgCode} AND t2.type = 'l' AND t2.`level` = '4' AND t4. LEVEL != '0' AND t6.letter_class_name = 'IPO审核结果反馈意见' ORDER BY askNo
SELECT auditmem FROM LICO_FP_FICFIRST WHERE companycode = #{orgCode} AND auditdate = #{examineDate} LIMIT 1
SELECT t1.id FROM sa_letter t1 LEFT JOIN letter_class t2 ON t2.id = t1.letter_type WHERE t2.letter_class_name = 'IPO审核结果反馈意见' AND t1.rela_code = #{orgCode} and t1.letter_date = #{date}
